dmca.title: [ABUSE] FW: Website Ripper - Need immediate Action
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 02, 2005 1:45 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FW: Website Ripper - Need immediate Action]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] FW: Website Ripper - Need immediate Action
Date:         Thu, 31 Mar 2005 09:44:53 -0600
From:         Steven Canale <scanale@theplanet.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>







Steven M. Canale

Director of Sales

The Planet Internet Services

scanale@theplanet.com <mailto:scanale@theplanet.com>

(214) 782.7828 Office

(800) 377.6103 Toll Free



- -----Original Message-----
*From:* Russ Clow [mailto:russclow@clubskill.com]
*Sent:* Thursday, March 31, 2005 9:27 AM
*To:* sales@theplanet.com
*Subject:* Website Ripper - Need immediate Action



Dear ThePlanet,

~                        My name is Russ Clow and I am the lead designer
at www.clubskill.com <http://www.clubskill.com>, a very popular online
gaming website.

I've recently come across a website using our images without permission.
The website URL is:

www.roguethumbs.com <http://www.roguethumbs.com>



This guy has basically stolen our whole image folder,
http://www.roguethumbs.com/images/.  To prove these are our images, please

see http://www.roguethumbs.com/images/forum.jpg (this image is on our
website's homepage).



I have not given this guy permission to use any of our images.  I perfomed a
WHOIS on the domain, and it led me to www.alvorado.com
<http://www.alvorado.com>

who I have emailed with regards to this, however a friend did a tracert on
the files and said they were actually hosted at http://theplanet.com/

so Im guessing alvorado have a resellers account with you?



Basically what Im asking for is immediate action to ensure that this guy
does not use our images on his site, and that he dosen't

go and steal someone elses images at a later date.  All images on our site
are copyright and so he is breaking that law.



I appreciate your time in helping me with this matter



Thanks alot in advance



Russ Clow

russclow@clubskill.com <mailto:russclow@clubskill.com>


- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCTvYevK/XpJs6oyURAmm5AKCh7Dh/bGrWiHnU9Z4Q7yv7kgCuCACgnw1h
AQ0qnFjIR0v8L9OksDy0SzM=
=9Cl/
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
